note:
Digital health | Consultant | Neuropsychologist

Hi! I'm an independent consultant who helps digital health companies generate evidence, awareness, and revenue.

I'm a neuropsychologist by training specialising in ALS/MND and other neurological disorders. I've been in digital health for 20 years, first in academia at King's College London, and then for 13 years as lead scientist as PatientsLikeMe.

I'm into publishing, strategy games, scifi, and dad jokes (primarily my own).
